[by:烧功]
[ti:Too Good(feat.Rihanna)]
[ar:Drake]
[al:]

[00:16.80]Oh yeah, yeah, yeah
[00:19.17]Oh yeah, yeah, yeah
[00:21.40]Yeah, look
[00:24.33]I don't know how to talk to you
[00:26.20]I don't know how to ask you if you're okay
[00:30.40]My friends always feel the need to tell me things
[00:34.39]Seems like they're just happier than us these days
[00:38.48]Yeah, these days I don't know how to talk to you
[00:42.57]I don't know how to be there when you need me
[00:47.00]It feels like the only time you see me
[00:50.78]Is when you turn your head to the side and look at me differently
[00:54.67]Yeah, and last night I think I lost my patience
[01:01.00]Last night I got high as the expectations
[01:05.00]Last night, I came to a realization
[01:10.00]And I hope you can take it
[01:12.12]I hope you can take it

[01:32.64]I just know I found myself getting lost with you

[02:27.16]It can't end like this
[02:28.88]We gotta take time with this
